name: Sesame Lime Salad
description: Looking for the perfect co-star for your main dish for a romantic date night at home? Whip up this simple side salad in just 5 minutes to get a full serving of veggies with your meal! The best part? The low-sodium dressing mix contains nutritional yeast, which adds savoury, umami flavours—so you don’t miss the salt—and compliments the tartness of the lime juice.

ingredients.name: Sesame Noodle Salad Dressing Mix or Sesame Ginger Dressing Mix

preparation: In a large bowl, squeeze in lime juice and whisk with oil and dressing mix.
Chop cucumber and slice cherry tomatoes in half.
Add greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and carrots to bowl; toss with dressing to combine.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and a dinner roll.
